## Normal bivariada  media (0,0)


```{r  echo = FALSE,message=FALSE,warning=FALSE}

library(bivariate)

fluidPage(
fluidRow(
  column(4,
         sliderInput("rho", label="Correlación",
              min = -1, max = 1, value =0.5 , step = 0.001)
         ),
  column(4,
          sliderInput("sigma2X", label = "VAR(X)",
                     min = 0.5, max = 5, value =1 , step = 0.01)
         ),
column(4,
          sliderInput("sigma2Y", label = "VAR(Y)",
                     min = 0.5, max = 5, value =1 , step = 0.01)
         )
 )
)


renderPlot({
  rho=input$rho
  sigma2X=input$sigma2X
  sigma2Y=input$sigma2Y
  f = bivariate::nbvpdf (0, 0, sigma2X, sigma2Y, rho)
  par(mfrow=c(1,2))
  plot(f,xlim=c(-4,4),ylim=c(-4,4))
  plot(f,TRUE,xlim=c(-4,4),ylim=c(-4,4))
  par(mfrow=c(1,1))
  })

```
